nodes.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!
nodes.title: Image Colorizer Repair - Repair old, damaged photographs and remove Scratches online
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: 基于人工智能技术，训练系统一键去除划痕，还原家庭老照片。如果没有高超的PhotoShop技术，是很难修复受损照片的。但现在，你只需3步，就能像专业人员一样完成!
localize.tagline: 修复旧的，损坏的照片和去除划痕在线。

localize.description: 基於人工智能技術，訓練系統一鍵去除劃痕，還原家庭老照片。如果沒有高超的PhotoShop技術，是很難修復受損照片的。但現在，你只需3步，就能像專業人員一樣完成!
localize.tagline: 修復舊的，損壞的照片和去除劃痕在線。

nodes.excerpt: Editable gives you the simplest way to make your videos intuitively annotated and easily marked up. Contrary to high-quality design editors like Photoshop’s paint brush or Final Cut Pro’s screen management, it just provides simple annotation experiences.
nodes.title: Editable - Annotate directly on any video files
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: Editable为你提供了一种最简单的方式，让你的视频直观地注释并轻松地标记起来。与Photoshop的画笔或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高质量的设计编辑器不同，它只是提供简单的注释体验。
localize.tagline: 直接对任何视频文件进行注释

localize.description: Editable爲你提供了一種最簡單的方式，讓你的視頻直觀地註釋並輕鬆地標記起來。與Photoshop的畫筆或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高質量的設計編輯器不同，它只是提供簡單的註釋體驗。
localize.tagline: 直接對任何視頻文件進行註釋

nodes.excerpt: Studio photography is no longer out of reach. Our full photo crew carefully hires models, designs scenes, and captures moments to offer you the best studio stock photos possible. With this new platform, you can find exactly what you need –or create it!

nodes.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth

nodes.author: Charles Miglietti

localize.description: 认为你的公司是数据驱动的？可能吧。但你如何确保你的数据为客户创造真正的价值？在这本电子书中，您将学习如何使用您的数据。赋予你的客户权力 🏆 改善你的产品供应 📈 推动持久的增长。
localize.tagline: 如何通过面向用户的分析来推动增长？

nodes.excerpt: Pika (pronounced pi·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
nodes.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Pika（发音为pi-kuh，像picker）是一款简单易用、开源的macOS原生色彩采集器。Pika让你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的颜色变得很简单，所以你可以继续成为一个快速、成功的设计师。
localize.tagline: 一款适用于macOS的开源颜色挑选器应用。

localize.description: Pika（發音爲pi-kuh，像picker）是一款簡單易用、開源的macOS原生色彩採集器。Pika讓你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的顏色變得很簡單，所以你可以繼續成爲一個快速、成功的設計師。
localize.tagline: 一款適用於macOS的開源顏色挑選器應用。

nodes.excerpt: https://tinyjar.com is a widget that lets you control all of your donation links in one place for Buymeacoffee, Ko-fi, Patreon, and more. 😎 No-Code Installation 💰 One Widget For All 📈 Micro-Crypto Donations 🖌️ Design Friendly
nodes.title: Tinyjar - Donations made easy
nodes.author: Jordan

localize.description: https://tinyjar.com 是一个小工具，可以让你在一个地方控制所有的捐赠链接，如Buymeacoffee，Ko-fi，Patreon等。😎 无代码安装 💰 一个小工具为所有人服务 📈 Micro-Crypto Donations 🖌️ 设计友好。
localize.tagline: 让捐款变得简单

localize.description: https://tinyjar.com 是一個小工具，可以讓你在一個地方控制所有的捐贈鏈接，如Buymeacoffee，Ko-fi，Patreon等。😎 無代碼安裝 💰 一個小工具爲所有人服務 📈 Micro-Crypto Donations 🖌️ 設計友好。
localize.tagline: 讓捐款變得簡單

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Smart Components in Framer, a new standard for interactive component design. From complete navigations and buttons with multiple states to nested hover effects, build anything visually and in just a few clicks—no code required. https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF
nodes.title: Smart Components by Framer - Design interactive components with multiple variants
nodes.author: Benjamin den Boer

localize.description: 在Framer中引入智能组件，这是一个交互式组件设计的新标准。从具有多种状态的完整导航和按钮到嵌套的悬停效果，只需点击几下就能建立任何视觉效果--无需代码。https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF。
localize.tagline: 设计具有多种变体的交互式组件

localize.description: 在Framer中引入智能組件，這是一個交互式組件設計的新標準。從具有多種狀態的完整導航和按鈕到嵌套的懸停效果，只需點擊幾下就能建立任何視覺效果--無需代碼。https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF。
localize.tagline: 設計具有多種變體的交互式組件
